features: 6 ADJUSTABLE HEIGHTS. Raise the height to increase difficulty as your kids grow. Basketball Set can be adjusted from 2.5 to 4 feet
OVERSIZED RIM. Designed with an oversized rim making it easier for kids to score baskets
INDOOR AND OUTDOOR USE. Little Tikes' basketball hoop for toddlers is sturdy and water-resistant so kids can use it outdoors or inside
DEVELOP SKILLS. Encourages preschoolers and toddlers to play independently while working on balance and improve their hand-eye coordination
Base must be weighted with 40lbs. of sand (not included )
Includes 3 junior sized, soft basketballs (color may vary)
Assembly Required , Age 1 1/2 to 5 years. Material:Plastic
body.description: The Little Tikes easy score basketball set, designed for children 18 months to 5 years old, introduces kids of all abilities to the game of basketball and competitive play. The height can be adjusted to six settings between 2.5 and 4 feet to accommodate even the littlest hoop Star. The oversize rim and kid-size basketball ensure easy scoring and help kids develop hand-eye coordination while providing the right challenge level. Before play, add sand to the base for stability. This product requires assembly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Gift for any kid
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this Toddler Basketball Hoop for my little nephew, and I must say, it's been a fantastic addition to his collection of toys and games. First off, the assembly was a breeze, which is a huge plus for busy holidays. The instructions were clear, and within minutes, it was ready for action.The design is perfect for toddlers, with bright colors and a sturdy build that ensures it can withstand even the most enthusiastic slam dunks. I appreciate how it adjusts as my nephew grows, making it versatile and offering long-term use.One of the standout features is the adjustable height, allowing us to tailor it to my nephews current height. This adaptability means it's not something they'll outgrow too quickly, adding to its value.Safety-wise, the hoop is well-constructed with smooth edges, eliminating any worries about accidental bumps or scratches. It encourages hand-eye coordination and motor skills development, which is a great skill to be implemented into a toy.Overall, the Fisher Price Toddler Basketball Hoop is a winner in our household. It's durable, encourages physical activity, and provides endless entertainment while aiding in developmental skills. It's a purchase I highly recommend to any parent looking for an interactive and enjoyable toy that grows with their child.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product was perfect for this little guy. The adjustable height is great and makes it easy for him to grow with it. It’s super light weight and very easy to assemble. Great purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best little goal
reviews.reviewText: This little goal is the best one for toddlers, because it is adjustable and sturdy. I used 25-lbs of the tiny aquarium rocks to fill the base instead of sand or water, because sand is messy and water will get old and moldy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super fun and easy setup
reviews.reviewText: The set up was quick and simple. The longest part was putting on the net but that was not more than 5 minutes. It has an adjustable height so we can use it for quite a while :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality for the price
reviews.reviewText: My 1.5 year old absolutely loves this basketball goal set! Perfect height for her and it’s easily adjustable for when she gets taller. The quality is great and it seems pretty durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and interactive
reviews.reviewText: Great on keep toddler occupied and moving! Only downside is not as sturdy and falls over easily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great for toddlers! My son is only 1 and LOVES this. Easy to assemble. If no sand is inside, easy to move around! Grows with your kiddo! Easy to clean! :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The Little Tikes Easy Score Basketball Set is a real slam dunk in our home! This set, which comes in a striking blue color and includes three balls, is an Amazon exclusive that has brought so much joy and laughter to our family.As a mom, I appreciate how it encourages active play and helps develop motor skills. The adjustable height means it grows with my child, providing years of fun. The oversized rim and the three junior size basketballs are perfect for little hands to grip and shoot successfully, boosting their confidence with every score.The sturdy base can be weighted with sand for stability, which is a thoughtful safety feature. It’s also lightweight enough to be easily moved around the house or into the yard on sunny days.In short, the Little Tikes Easy Score Basketball Set has been a great investment in fun, active play and skill-building for my little one.

reviews.reviewTitle: Perfect Gift for those active children in your life
reviews.reviewText: Love this basketball hoop and balls . Encourages motor skills in fun active play. Easy to set up and take down. Easy to move to different locations. Safe and Sturdy materials. A great choice.

reviews.reviewTitle: La compre por qué la tuve de niño
reviews.reviewText: Se las compre a mis hijos y sigue siendo buen producto
Great product enjoyed by my grandson.

reviews.reviewTitle: 値段だけの価値はあります
reviews.reviewText: 他のおもちゃ屋さんにあるものよりも頑丈だと思います。砂を入れるのが手間ですが、その分倒れる心配がなくなり、更に壁掛けと違いどこでも置けるのが良い点です。細かく高さも変えられることで、年齢に応じたセッティングが可能です。海外からの発送ですが、割と早く(1週間以内程度)で届きました。説明にはボールが一個とありますが、3つ入っていました。
Gift for grandchildren, always fun to play indoors or outdoors
